Message.Text: Frank, guess what? I just found out the students are sharing their code on Snapchat! Isn’t that hilarious?
Tommy, they’re actually using Discord, not Snapchat. That’s where all the action happens!
No way! It’s gotta be Snapchat. I mean, can you imagine them snapping their code to each other? It’s too funny!
It’s not Snapchat, though! They’re on Discord—sending code files, creating channels, all that. It’s way more practical.
But think about it, Frank! Coding... on Snapchat! That’s so wild, right? These kids come up with the weirdest ways to do things!
I mean, it would be weird... if they were using Snapchat. But they’re not. They’re using Discord. You’re mixing it up!
Well, whatever it is, it’s hilarious either way! These students are just too creative sometimes!
